$ZIM I have to admit; I thought the share price could go down to $50/share. I held on based on ZIM's business model. Buying new LPG ships was big for me. They smartly grabbed leases when others turned down ship lease renewals base on the economy. ZIM made me think of Warren Buffet during the banking crisis. Buffet bought up multiple financial institutions dirt cheap while everyone else bailed out.
